---
title: "Data Cleaning"
output: html_document
---

```{r}
games<-read.csv('Video games sales.csv')

nrow(games)
```

```{r}
games<-na.omit(games)
unique(games$Rating)
games$Rating <- ifelse(games$Rating== "", NA,games$Rating )
unique(games$Rating)
games<-subset(games,games$Rating!="NA")
games<-subset(games,games$Year_of_Release!="N/A")
nrow(games)
```
